body_html:
Ok, it doesn't work and problem not in mine code, but isn't it should be fixed?

I want to use colab and tpu.
Docs advise to use TPU estimator. But it doesnt work in colab.

Can I at least disable autosaving? I have not found such an option in docs.

I want to use colab and tpu.
